name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audible for PC, windows and Mac - Free Download

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audible for Windows PC and Mac extensions come with pro-grade recording, with Record, save, and Audio Playback features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to record any audio easily and save it to your PC. Using stopping and play features, you can stopping the recording and playing back the recorded audio for review, it offers convenience.

You can also find the playback speed option, allowing you to speed up the audio playback and review your recorded audio quickly.

Features for Audible Extension:

1. Easy audio recording and saving to PC
2. Stopping and playing features for convenient recording review
3. Playback speed option for quick audio review

Note: This chrome extension is only developed for Audio lovers FAN.
